description: The information contained in this notice is a brief description of the requirement and is for information purposes only.
full_summary:
**Task-Based Information Professional Services Tender**
=====================================================

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Ref. No.:** PW-22-01011859

**Release Date:** October 31, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 14, 2022 14:00:00

**Amendment Date:** November 11, 2022

**Contracting Entity:** Elections Canada

**Description:**

Elections Canada is seeking a certified Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) supplier to provide information technology (IT) professional services on an as-needed basis to support its various activities and initiatives. The services required include a range of categories, including business analyst, project management, application services, and information management/information technology services.

**Objective:**

The objective of this RFP is to establish a supplier capacity-based procurement vehicle to meet Elections Canada's specific IT needs. The selected supplier will be required to provide a range of services, including but not limited to:

* Business Services
	+ Business Analyst (Level 3)
	+ Business Architect (Level 3)
	+ Business Consultant (Level 3)
	+ Business Continuity/Disaster Recovery Specialist (Level 3)
	+ Business Process Re-Engineering Consultant (Level 3)
	+ Business System Analyst (Level 3)
	+ Business Transformation Architect (Level 3)
* Project Management Services
	+ Change Management Consultant (Level 3)
	+ Enterprise Architect (Level 3)
	+ Project Executive (Level 3)
	+ Project Coordinator (Level 3)
	+ Project Leader (Level 3)
	+ Project Manager (Level 3)
	+ Project Scheduler (Level 3)
	+ Quality Insurance Specialist (Level 3)
* Application Services
	+ Application Software Architect (Level 3)
	+ Enterprise Resource Planning Functional Analyst (Level 3)
	+ Enterprise Resource Planning Programmer Analyst (Level 3)
	+ Enterprise Resource Planning System Analyst (Level 3)
	+ Enterprise Resource Planning Technical Analyst (Level 3)
* Information Management/Information Technology Services
	+ Data Conversion Specialist (Level 3)
	+ Database Administrator (Level 3)
	+ Database Analyst/Information Management Administrator (Level 3)
	+ Database Modeller/Information Management Modeller (Level 3)
	+ Information Management Architect (Level 3)

**Security Requirements:**

The selected supplier must meet the minimum corporate security requirements of DOS - Reliability
